name: Braking Down
description:
Your car is on the fritz in the middle of a desert.
Your brakes don't work properly, and your steering wheel sticks and drifts.
It's up to your driving skills to keep you alive on this sandy road.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Controls:

D, E, S, X, Right Shift, Right Mouse  ->  Turn Clockwise
A, Q, W, Z, Left Shift, Left Mouse -> Turn Counter Clockwise
Enter, Space, Middle Mouse -> Slow Down

Sprites based on the following models:

Cartoon Low Poly Chrystler New Yorker 3D Model by Renderbunny
https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1496394
License: https://blog.turbosquid.com/turbosquid-3d-model-license/#3d-model-license

https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1340212
License: https://blog.turbosquid.com/turbosquid-3d-model-license/#3d-model-license

Sylized Rocks by Martyana Grek
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/stylized-rocks-e5fc4b1e630943d9a453d6b4bcd588b6
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
